products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.

products.title: Splash Rose Gold Roller Blind
products.description: Splash rose gold is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash rose gold roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: This pastel mellow yellow roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty yellow fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash solar yellow is a bright and sunny yellow perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous yellow blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash solar yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold yellow roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash rose gold electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The soft rose gold roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Contemporary and stylish, their moisture-resistant splash mellow yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. This pastel yellow electric roller is a beautiful, warm-toned colour which will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space. At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
